0.3.name: wordpress/video-blogger
0.3.description: Beta in development please see this post for basic instructions to get started: http://www.webtechglobal.co.uk/wordpress/video-blogger/beta-peek-at-video-blogger/. Let us know what you need. The intended direction of this plugin is episode management. Features to communicate new episodes and invite others to publish their videos on your website is something we have in mind.
